title: 571.92 GARNISHMENT OF EARNINGS.
text: Sections 571.921 to 571.926 relate to the garnishment of earnings. The exemptions available under section 550.37 apply to the garnishment of earnings if the debtor is a resident of Minnesota and the debtor's place of employment is in Minnesota, regardless of where the employer is domiciled. For the purposes of this section, "place of employment" means the location where an employee earns wages.
